Job Description:

Our client in the retail technology space in Mississauga has an immediate opening for a Database Administrator (Production). The preferred candidate will have experience working with SQL Servers v2000 and 2005, and Analysis Server 2000 and 2005 (MS OLAP).



Responsibilities:



Full understanding of all database interactions with application in our production environment
Daily maintenance and review of system related items for all database server
Investigation and resolution to database system related performance issues
Install, upgrade and maintain all production and office database systems
Support all business units from a database perspective
Administer, monitoring of all database related processes. This includes but not limited to proper maintenance and backup routines
Support systems database environment for all daily, monthly operations. On call availability to respond to priority one incidents. 24x7 may be require
Database production issues to be investigated and root cause analysis discovery
Maintenance of databases environments by staying on top of, reviewing anticipated performance and capacity volumes. Subsequently providing input for improvement and tuning
10. Proactive monitoring

11. Provide consultation on database technology for any cross functional changes i.e. application design, systems design, new products

12. Champion Database environment disaster recovery plan

13. Co-manage and determine project plans for database related projects



Qualifications:



Technology focused degree (computer science, software engineer, etc.)
MS SQL related to OLTP and DS databases (stored procedures, functions, tables, views, indexes, triggers, etc.)
SSIS, ETL, Job management
MS OLAP (AS2000 and AS2005)
5-7 years working experience
Experience working in a .net environment
Excellent English language skills
A highly organized, detail oriented attitude
